com.google.appinventor.client

Class ExtendedServiceProxy<T extends RemoteService>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.ExtendedServiceProxy<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the synchronous service interface

    public class ExtendedServiceProxy<T extends RemoteService>
extends Object
    Extended interface that is implemented by all service proxies that are generated by ExtendedServiceProxyGenerator. This interface adds two features to service proxies:
    1. Clients can be notified of all service calls by attaching RpcListeners to the service proxy using the addRpcListener(RpcListener) method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtendedServiceProxy() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRpcListener(RpcListener listener)
      Adds a listener that is notified of RPC events.
      protected void fireFailure(String method, Throwable caught)
      Calls the RpcListener.onFailure(String, Throwable) method for all listeners.
      protected void fireStart(String method, Object... params)
      Calls the RpcListener.onStart(String, Object...) method for all listeners.
      protected void fireSuccess(String method, Object result)
      Calls the RpcListener.onSuccess(String, Object) method for all listeners.
      void removeRpcListener(RpcListener listener)
      Removes a listener that has been added using the addRpcListener(RpcListener) method before.

      • fireStart

        protected void fireStart(String method,
             Object... params)
        Calls the RpcListener.onStart(String, Object...) method for all listeners.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the RPC method that was called
        params - the params of the RPC method that was called

      • fireSuccess

        protected void fireSuccess(String method,
               Object result)
        Calls the RpcListener.onSuccess(String, Object) method for all listeners.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the RPC method that was successfully completed
        result - the result of the RPC method

      • fireFailure

        protected void fireFailure(String method,
               Throwable caught)
        Calls the RpcListener.onFailure(String, Throwable) method for all listeners.
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the RPC method that threw an exception.
        caught - the thrown exception
